channel.title: Gingerbread-Running-On-Old-G1s on Cross Dominant
channel.description: Recent content in Gingerbread-Running-On-Old-G1s on Cross Dominant

item.title: Gingerbread running on old G1
item.description:
#“Gingerbread running on old G1”

There is still life left in the old dog yet. Sure it plods along pretty slowly but to be able to run the absolute latest version of Android on the oldest device is fun.

Overclocked from theoriginal328Mhz to 614 Mhz :-) On Earth Hour day, oh how naughty. Angry Birds installing now. I don't hold much hope. Fruit Ninja is almost playable.
